data.text: @centrist_phone I'm sure he has arranged a nuclear bunker for himself
@centrist_phone His kid's are in Europe too apparently

@centrist_phone I think its real. Stalin's paranoia for example, didnt stop the killing of millions of his own people. The mindset of the narcist megalamanic can be unpredictable. You can read up on Putin's charecter profile. It doesn't make a good read😥
@Garrardinho Fear of death drives his extreme covid protocols. People with a massive fear of death don't kill themselves.
@Garrardinho @centrist_phone The world can't be held hostage by a mad man.

@centrist_phone If he's clearly not sound of mind, then probably not a good idea to provoke him into taking a course of action to which there may be a twisted logic in his own head. His rationality is not necessarily our rationality.
